member.param: An array of enumeration values, which specify series views to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.FilterSeriesTypesCollection.Remove(DevExpress.XtraCharts.ViewType)

summary.para: Removes the series view of the specified type from the collection of hidden series views.

member.param: A enumeration value, specifying the type of page tab to be removed from the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTabCollection.Add(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTab)

summary.para: Appends the page tab of the specified type to the current collection of hidden page tabs.

member.param: A enumeration value, which specifies the page tab to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTabCollection.AddRange(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTab[])

member.param: An array of enumeration values, which specify page tabs to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTabCollection.Remove(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.SeriesLabelsPageTab)
